content: TE 50-AVR Rotary hammer Our most compact SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer for lightweight comfort and control while drilling or chiseling in concrete, stone, and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Exceptionally light and versatile SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer Low contact pressure for high user comfort Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity Optional DRS-Y dust removal system collects up to 95% of dust Detachable supply cord for quick and easy replacement of damaged/broken cords on the jobsite Applications Light to medium-duty chiseling in masonry and concrete Hammer drilling in concrete, masonry and natural stone (possible diameter range 1/2- 2, recommended diameter range 5/8 - 1 1/4) Drilling penetrations mainly in masonry using percussion core bits (possible diameter range 1 3/4- 5 15/16, recommended diameter range up to 3 1/4 ) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 13.4 lb. Weight class: 11 lb. Single impact energy: 4.4 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 13.4 lb | Weight class | 11 lb | Single impact energy | 4.4 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 15/32 - 3-7/32 in | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 5/8 - 1-3/8 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 360 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 3510 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Vibration Reduction (AVR), Chiseling, Depth gauge | Triaxial vibration value for hammer drilling into concrete (ah,HD) | 8.8 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-Y, TE DRS-D, TE DRS-BK | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 7.1 m/s² | 2 | Rated input power | 1100 W | A-weighted emission sound power level | 108 dB (A) | 3 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 100 dB (A) | 4 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3553052 - TE 50-AVR performance package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 50-AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE 50-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Pointed chisel TE-YX SM 36 - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-YX 3/4-13 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 2127969 - Corded Rotary Hammer TE 50-AVR 120 V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 50-AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE 50-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
